comment.author: 83117903@N00
comment._content: A beautiful work of art and a great bit of whimsy of how snowfall happens.

comment.author: 8505310@N04
comment._content: It looks like Rockwell Kent - or - at least Rockwell Kent-esque. Maybe it's this: Untitled [Angel hovering upright in night sky above winter landscape, dropping stars from her hands]. Metal relief print with two colors. 1928. libweb.princeton.edu/libraries/firestone/rbsc/aids/gc042....
